mapper.select: select count(*) from search where search_word = #{searchWord}
select search_word, count(*) search_count from search where (search_date between to_date(#{first_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{last_date},'YYYY-MM-DD')) group by search_word

select search_word, count(*) search_count from search where
search_word like '%'||#{item}||'%'
and search_date between to_date(#{first_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{last_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') group by search_word

select c.*, avg_price, store_img from (select distinct b.* from (select a.*, stime_start, stime_end, stime_break from (select * from store where
store_addr like #{city}||'%'||#{unit}||'%' and
store_state='TRUE')a, store_time
where stime_day=#{week} and a.store_idx=store_time.store_idx
)b
,
(select category.* from
category where category.cate_value_idx=#{tagList.valueidx})
cate where b.store_idx=cate.store_idx
)c, (select store_idx, round(avg(menu_price),0) avg_price from menu, menu_cate where menu.m_cate_idx=menu_cate.m_cate_idx group by store_idx)price, store_img where c.store_idx=price.store_idx and store_img.store_idx=price.store_idx and img_order=1 order by store_area asc
